            Hey There!
            Welcome to my personal site! I am a data analyst working in healthcare research. I specialize in using R and SAS for data analysis, epidemiological research, and data visualizations. I am also passionate about computational art, knowledge sharing / dissemination, and how to mix the two. Check out my most recent projects on my Projects tab.
            Let’s collaborate!
            Do you want to use one of my computational art pieces? Interested in having me talk at your organization or group? Do you have an idea that doesn’t fit the previous questions? Email me!

              Hey There!
              Welcome to my personal site! I am a data analyst working in healthcare research. I specialize in using R and SAS for data analysis, epidemiological research, and data visualizations. I am also passionate about computational art, knowledge sharing / dissemination, and how to mix the two. Check out my most recent projects on my Projects tab.
              Let’s collaborate!
              Do you want to use one of my computational art pieces? Interested in having me talk at your organization or group? Do you have an idea that doesn’t fit the previous questions? Email me!

articles.title: Projects
articles.contents:
rtistry art gallery


A celebration and showcase of art in all of its forms created by the #rstats community.

Entry for the RStudio 2021 Shiny Competition.






{contouR}


An R package for creating patterns using geom_contour().






TidyTuesday


A #R4DS Weekly Challenge. I am a regular contributor and all of my visualization are created solely using ggplot() and other extension packages.






COVID-19 Visualization


An infectious disease natural history primer for U.C. Berkeley School of Public Health
